name: Marine School Simulator
description:
School life experience on island in the Minami tropical sea!
Marine School Simulator is a third-person action-adventure game.
This is a small island in the South Sea. There are only girls
Cook special dishes, farm in the fields, attract tourists, improve your island reputation, level up and boost with the points you earn.
Spend your free days defeating dangerous creatures and relaxing with your cute girlfriends.

Customize your character's appearance with many costumes and hairstyles
Over 20 classmates, various collectibles

Controls.
Mouse + keyboard and gamepad support; XBOX controllers are encouraged.
